post.text: I want to see America PROSPEROUS again – that means tax cuts for working families, and lower taxes for small businesses so owners can create more jobs! America will WIN – everyone will succeed and we will have a strong, thriving economy once again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Rockie
comment.text: Do not let Chelsea's feelings get in the way of this debate. Fight for America. Fight for us.

replies.author: Garrett
replies.text: Chelsea is just as much of a criminal as her parents - prison for all of them.

replies.author: Mikayla
replies.text: AND WHEN YOU ARE FIGHTING FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE, IT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT FIGHT OF YOUR LIFE, SO SHOW NO MERCY! WE DEMAND IT!
